fixes: Enabling or disabling distance specific segments no longer leaves behind segments if they were set when the value was changed.
0 is now a valid distance for a Distance.
Segments are now uploaded for all distances if distance specific segments is set to disabled.
Segments (including finish) will no longer attempt to be uploaded if the distance value is 0.
Fixed issues where results would be marked as uploaded regardless of whether or not they were successfully uploaded.
Fixed an issue where the manual upload button would change back to its not-uploading state immediately after starting the upload.
